Directions: In a large skillet, saute sausage, broccoli and onion for 5-6 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Add the tomatoes, basil, parsley and sugar. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Add pasta and heat through.
Ingredients: 1 pound fully cooked kielbasa or Polish sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices
